text: aur (ai rasool vah vakt bhee yaad dilao) jab ibaraaheem ne dua maangee ki ai mere paravaradigaar is (shahar) ko panaah va aman ka shahar bana, aur usake rahane vaalon mein se jo khuda aur roze aakhirat par eemaan lae usako tarah-tarah ke phal khaane ko den khuda ne pharamaaya (achchha magar) vo kuphr ikhateyaar karega usakee duniya mein chand roz (un cheezo se) phaayada uthaane doonga phir (aakherat mein) usako majaboor karake dozakh kee taraph kheench le jaoonga aur vah bahut bura thikaana hai
